FuncDef:
The bpdu discard command enables an interface to discard BPDUs.
The undo bpdu discard command disables an interface from discarding BPDUs.
By default, an interface is disabled from discarding BPDUs.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To protect a device against BPDU attacks, run the bpdu discard command to enable an interface to discard received BPDUs, preventing them from being sent them to the CPU.
